Title: Marvel Super Hero Adventures: Frost Fight!
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Mark Banker, Joe Simon (created by: Captain America), Jack Kirby (created by: Captain America), Bill Mantlo (created by: Rocket Raccoon), Keith Giffen (created by: Rocket Raccoon)
Actors: Mick Wingert, Matthew Mercer, Travis Willingham, Fred Tatasciore
Plot: The Marvel Heroes unite to try and stop Loki and the frost giant Ymir from conquering the world as the duo try to steal Santa's powers to do so.
Production: Marvel Animation, Walt Disney Company, Marvel Entertainment
